original_text: And he dealt wisely and distributed some of his sons through all the districts of Judah and Benjamin, in all the fortified cities, and he gave them abundant provisions and procured wives for them.
korean_text: 르호보암이 지혜롭게 행하여 그의 모든 아들을 유다와 베냐민의 온 땅 모든 견고한 성읍에 흩어 살게 하고 양식을 후히 주고 아내를 많이 구하여 주었더라

sentences.original_text: and distributed some of his sons
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 아들들 중 몇을 흩어 보냈고

sentences.original_text: through all the districts of Judah and Benjamin,
and he gave them abundant provisions
